feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 3 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 1:48 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:48 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
